name: ArriveBefore
tag_list: social-media, event, travel, opportunity, value-add, start-up, meeting, network
overview:
ArriveBefore is a patent pending method for leveraging social networks in advance of an event or trip to add value to people through location based services.

Conceived from too many missed opportunities in NYC after travelling in from Australia, ArriveBefore was born. With only an average number of social media users, the Founder and CEO could always find one friend or a couple in NYC at the same time. This despite being 20 hours by flight from home but the problem was visits were short, time at a premium and friends only identified from a status update or posting of pictures. Often this was too late to do anything about.

After realising a gap existed in publishing your upcoming Check-in, ArriveBefore came to life through a Patent Pending method to enable experiences to be enhanced by those in your social networks.

milestones.description: Go Live! Months of long hours and hard work in true start-up style saw us Go Live on target and within our initial funding budget.
